body_html:
Hi @rryan

tf.contrib.signal.mfccs_from_log_mel_spectrograms - for computing MFCCs from log mel spectrograms with GPU and gradient support.

Does this mean GPU is used for feature extraction of audio signals or for training models.

Thanks
body_text:
Hi @rryan

Does this mean GPU is used for feature extraction of audio signals or for training models.
Thanks
body:
Hi @rryan 

> tf.contrib.signal.mfccs_from_log_mel_spectrograms - for computing MFCCs from log mel spectrograms with GPU and gradient support.

Does this mean GPU is used for feature extraction of audio signals or for training models.

Thanks
